Plot: When an idealistic writer disappears during the Right Wing military coup in 1973 Chile, his wife and American businessman father try to find him.
Title: Missing
Writer: Costa-Gavras (screenplay), Donald Stewart (screenplay), Thomas Hauser (based on the book: "Missing")
Actors: Jack Lemmon, Sissy Spacek, Melanie Mayron, John Shea
tomatoConsensus: Thanks in large part to strong performances by Sissy Spacek and Jack Lemmon, Missing is both a gripping character exploration and an effective political thriller.
